title: Ticket #1931: Improve cream_gahp command batching
description:
The cream_gahp will batch many commands from the gridmanager that act on a single job into a single CREAM API command that acts on a list of jobs. This batching of commands improves efficiency. This work was done in ticket #938.

Some further efficiency improvements can be achieved as follows:

  • Batch STATUS commands that act on a single job
  • Batch REGISTER commands
  • Improve error handling for batched commands
remarks:
2011-Feb-25 13:55:48 by jfrey:
In initial testing of batched REGISTER commands, attempts to batch 500 commands into one CREAM called failed with this error: 
EOF detected during communication. Probably service closed connection or SOCKET TIMEOUT occurred.

2011-Feb-28 18:13:06 by jfrey:
Pushed commit to V7_5_6-branch for 7.5.6. Register commands are not batched, but the code is in place for doing so. Status commands are batched and errors are handled correctly.

2011-Mar-30 16:35:44 by jfrey:
Pushed commit to V7_6-branch for 7.6.0. REGISTER commands are now batched in groups of 10. This led to a noticeable increase in communication failures, which I fixed by doing retries of the commands properly (was broken before).
